QuestData.Title: Fury Given Voice
QuestData.Description:
I will answer this attack upon my val'kyr with relentless fury!
You have a vital role to play in this, $c. You will muster the courage that you have demonstrated this day to lure my Eye to battle.
But first, a simpler task ... the creation of the horn that will summon my wrath. Master Smith Helgar will guide you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Assist Master Smith Helgar at the Forge of Odyn.
QuestData.RewardText:
This is well made, $n.
Of course, every great horn has a name. It is our tradition!
